name: Ori Marani Mamastan PetNat
description: A naturally sparkling wine made with indigenous Imeretian grapes. Funky, fresh, and fizzy.

name: Ori Marani Rkatsiteli Exile on Caucasus
description: Rich amber wine aged in qvevri and oak. Notes of dried apricot, herbs, and spice.

name: Ethno Saperavi
description: A bold red with blackberry and plum notes. Smooth tannins and juicy finish.

name: Ethno Kisi Bio Qvevri
description: Organic amber wine with floral and honeyed aromas. Full-bodied with a hint of bitterness.

name: Ethno Kakhuri Mtsvane-Rkatsiteli
description: An elegant amber blend with peach and wildflower notes. Long, mineral finish.

name: Baias Wine Tsitska-Tsolikauri Qvevri
description: Aromatic white wine with citrus, stone fruit, and light tannins from clay aging.

name: Baias Wine Krakhuna Qvevri
description: Golden-hued amber wine with crisp acidity, nuts, and baked apple notes.

name: Orgo Rkatsiteli
description: Classic qvevri Rkatsiteli with deep structure, tannins, and dried fruit flavors.

name: Gio's Marani Mukuzani
description: Dry red matured in oak, with notes of black cherry, cocoa, and spice.

name: Doremi Rkatsiteli-Mtsvane Qvevri
description: Rustic blend fermented in qvevri, with aromas of dried citrus, spice, and tea.

name: Binekhi Tsolikauri
description: Creamy oak-aged white with delicate floral tones and round mouthfeel.

name: Simoneti PetNat Tsolikauri
description: Fresh bubbly wine with orchard fruit and herbal notes. Party in a bottle!

name: Two Sisters Tsolikauri Kvishkhuri
description: Elegant natural wine with crisp pear, citrus peel, and subtle tannins.

name: Nanatri Goruli Mtsvane Qvevri
description: Rare green varietal from Kartli. Aromatic and vibrant with nutty notes.
